en-US.summary: Learn many facts about the Appalachian Trail.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask appalachian trail facts for a fact
Alexa tell appalachian trail facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Appalachian Trail Facts
en-US.description:
In this skill, and learn information about the longest marked hiking trail in America, the Appalachian Trail.

Appalachian Trail Facts is informative and inspiring; you may just want to go on a hike yourself after hearing a few facts!

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Appalachian Trail Facts" or "Alexa, open Appalachian Trail Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
